dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 5968 IH: To amend the State Department Basic Authorities Act of 1956 to provide for a crisis evacuation loan program, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Langworthy (for himself, Mr. Weber of Texas, Mr. Donalds, Mr. Steube, Ms. Malliotakis, Mrs. Cammack, Mr. Lamborn, and Mr. Balderson) introduced the following bill

Referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, and in addition to the Committee on Appropriations, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: To amend the State Department Basic Authorities Act of 1956 to provide for a crisis evacuation loan program, and for other purposes.

section.text: Section 4 of the State Department Basic Authorities Act of 1956 (22 U.S.C. 2671) is amended—

paragraph.text: in subsection (b)(2)(A)(ii), by striking , on a reimbursable basis to the maximum extent practicable, and all that follows and inserting a semicolon; and
in subsection (d), by striking repatriations loan program and inserting crisis evacuation loan program.

section.text: Notwithstanding any other provision of law, amounts made available to carry out the Department of Homeland Security’s Shelter and Services Program shall be made available to the Department of State to carry out section 4(b)(2)(A)(ii) of the State Department Basic Authorities Act of 1956 (22 U.S.C. 2671(b)(2)(A)(ii)), as amended by section 1(1).
